news.title: British surgeon's 'high anxiety' operating in Gaza
news.summary: Dr Rose has been describing life at Nassar Hospital in Gazan city of Khan Younis.

news.title: Ministers consider easing winter fuel payment cuts
news.summary: Options under discussion include changing eligibility, or restoring the payments to all pensioners.

news.title: Doubts over whether Brits can use EU e-gates this summer
news.summary: It is unclear whether UK travellers can avoid long queues this summer and use e-gates at European airports.

news.title: Spain orders Airbnb to take down 66,000 listings as mass tourism backlash returns
news.summary: The Spanish government calls for the removal of almost 66,000 property listings saying they breach tourism rules.

news.title: Second man charged over fires at homes linked to Starmer
news.summary: Stanislav Carpiuc, 26, has been charged with conspiracy to commit arson with intent to endanger life, police say.

news.summary: It is not necessary to have held a Mastercard to make a claim, after a court ruled historic fees the firm administered were unfair.

news.title: Girl, 11, who drowned at water park unlawfully killed, inquest rules
news.summary: Kyra Hill, 11, drowned during a birthday party at the park near Windsor in August 2022.

news.title: Maintenance worker arrested for assisting New Orleans jail break
news.summary: Sterling Williams is accused of helping 10 inmates escape the Orleans Parish Jail on Friday.

news.title: Her bravery shone through, says family of firefighter who died in business park blaze
news.summary: Firefighters Jennie Logan and Martyn Sadler, along with father Dave Chester, died in the fire.
